item.title: Jihad Comes to New Orleans
item.description: The New Year’s truck-ramming attack is a tragic reminder that the threat of radical Islamic terrorism has not gone away.

item.title: Federalism Isn’t a Partisan Fallback — It’s a Foundation
item.description: The Left’s new emphasis on state authority reflects not appreciation for federalism but partisan maneuvering until Democrats regain control of Washing...

item.title: Saturday Night Is SNL’s Propaganda Origin Story
item.description: Jason Reitman commemorates TV’s Great Corruption.

item.title: The Next American Century Is Now
item.description: The divergence between America and the rest of the world is only going to accelerate.

item.title: The Three Holiday Ghosts of Taking Responsibility
item.description: It’s always worth remembering that the person responsible for probably 95 percent of what you do is you.
